title: End of Season 1: All of the Updates You Need
description:
After a season full of crazy legal issues with your favorite celebrities, we had to come back with some updates before we go on summer schedule! Check it out.
 
Show notes: On Monday, July 26, Britney Spears' new attorney Mathew Rosengart filed a motion to remove Jamie Spears as conservator and replace him with Jason Rubin, a certified public accountant who, according to his firm's website, has experience managing trust portfolios worth more than $35 million.  Britney is not waiving her right to terminate the conservatorship.

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/legallyjudgy/?hl=en
Twitter: https://twitter.com/LegallyJudgy
